msbt.message: Better get your core in gear! The big Turkey Day feast is coming up to the starting line, !I've been doing septuple arm sets to bulk up my silverware technique. That food doesn't stand a chance!
Hear that? It's the calm before the food-storm. The Turkey Day feast is gonna kick off any minute now.I've been doing crunches non-stop since yesterday to get my abs ready for this, . Bring it on!

It's the most protein-packed day of the year, and I am PUMPED to start cooking! Come on Turkey Day!I've been researching pro-athlete cuisine, and I even brought out the GOOD protein powder, !If you've got time later, you should absolutely sprint by for a taste test.
